data.eml:eml: Eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) of Taiwan: thirty-seven species from Yangmingshan, including one new genus and twenty-two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Huang, Kun-Wei, Wang, Chin-Fah (2009): Eriophyoid mites (Acari: Eriophyoidea) of Taiwan: thirty-seven species from Yangmingshan, including one new genus and twenty-two new species. Zootaxa 1986: 1-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.185424
